metadata.title: CVE-2022-48843 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/vrr: Set VRR capable prop only if it is attached to connectorVRR capable property is not attached by default to the connectorIt is attached only if VRR is supported.So if the driver tries to call drm core set prop function withoutit being attached that causes NULL dereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
